title: [GAMEPLAY]Master Yi kills himself when buying Guinsoo's Rageblade.
body: This bug happens when you buy Guinsoo's Rageblade,the damage done to the enemy is applied on Yi too.Master Yi also slows himself when he buys Frozen Mallet (also in Highlander). Screen: http://prntscr.com/dawfvy

replies.body: Nice, now just apply these effects to all ranged champs and the boards will be happy. You're on to something here riot.

he got kassadined
-never forget kassadin the only assasin that can only kill himself.
Could this just be a visual bug with the death recap, does this only happen on Baron, did you see while fighting that it was clearly hurting you?
It doesn't only happen with baron but with champs/minions too.You can kill yourself by autoattacking scuttle crab...

Revenge of the Scuttle Crab.
Now in theaters.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=74gzj9Ax,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-24T00:04:01.335+0000)
>
> Revenge of the Scuttle Crab.
> Now in theaters.

**[17:10] Scuttle Crab: **"I finally have enough gold... this will be my last death to you, Master Yi!"

_She waddles to the shop._
_Incredulous, the shopkeeper debates with her, telling her that she can't buy anything._

**[27:31] Scuttle Crab: **"But I have enough gold. What makes me different than the champions?"
**[27:50] Shopkeeper: **"I can only serve red side champions."
**[28:08] Scuttle Crab: **"Well the fountain turret didn't target me, so I'm obviously a red side champion!"

**[28:56] Shopkeeper: **"All right fine, here's your Thornmail."

Tank's for the report.
You're a good player Pierfranco <3<3<3<3<3<3<3
I tried it in a custom game.  Attacking scuttle crab with 6 stacks doesn't hurt me (I have some life steal, but my HP doesn't even move.)
I've seen posts since the patch about this same thing.  Not always against Baron or neutral monsters.  As to whether or not it is dealing damage to you.  Unknown.  I'll verify soon.
Ha.  Please make this stay.
The bug is back lol. {{champion:82}}  {{champion:4}}  and many more could kill themselves back when {{item:1416}} was Devourer

Is it only with Master Yi?
Yes, you have to have double strike and guinsoos double hit at the same time. And it will apply all on-hit effects to yourself.

master yi also dies while untargetable ,and i bought guinsoo on kayle today ,no wonder i was dying so fast.

3600 g to auto kill

It's not Guinsoo's, it's Yi with Guinsoo's. Kayle can't kill herself.

It happens when double strike and guinsoos double hit are on the same auto attack. Normally this won't happen, but if your double strike gets off by one attack (like when you kill a minion with the first part so the second part doesn't give you a double strike stack) then it will happen.

This can't be real, there would be a video with someone proving it if Yi really could kill himself on the scuttle crab.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZZ9QLCfhtI
I thought you were kidding at first.
good

I was playing a game with Yi and I didn't even realize that. Not even while just attacking minionwaves. Guess I just lifesteald it back.

Anyway, I feel like the Guinsoo's and BotRK buffs made him really strong again, even with that bug existing. Just a feling though.
It's a sign.
